testsuite.name: Scenario: Verify lessons can be navigated by changing the URL

testcase.name: Given I am logged in as the default administrator
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify lessons can be navigated by changing the URL

testcase.name: And I am on the Content Repository page of Demonstration Class
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify lessons can be navigated by changing the URL

testcase.name: And I choose creating new lesson in "Student Readiness" unit from the main dropdown button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify lessons can be navigated by changing the URL

testcase.name: And Lesson Editor is opened
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify lessons can be navigated by changing the URL

testcase.name: When enter Lesson name "Lesson url navigation"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify lessons can be navigated by changing the URL

testcase.name: And I add new section "Section 1"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify lessons can be navigated by changing the URL

testcase.name: Then a new section "Section 1" appears in the navigation
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify lessons can be navigated by changing the URL

testcase.name: When I add new page "Page 1" from the section drop down
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify lessons can be navigated by changing the URL

testcase.name: Then a new page "Page 1" appears in the navigation
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify lessons can be navigated by changing the URL

testcase.name: And I click the new question button on the lesson design page
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify lessons can be navigated by changing the URL

testcase.name: And I create question "Formula Question 1" with label "Formula Question Label"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify lessons can be navigated by changing the URL

testcase.name: And I create a Mathematical Formula response area in the lesson question editor
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify lessons can be navigated by changing the URL

testcase.name: And I save & close the new question in the assignment editor
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify lessons can be navigated by changing the URL

testcase.name: When I add new page "Page 2" from the section drop down
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify lessons can be navigated by changing the URL

testcase.name: Then a new page "Page 2" appears in the navigation
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify lessons can be navigated by changing the URL

testcase.name: When I click the new question button on the lesson design page
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify lessons can be navigated by changing the URL

testcase.name: And I create question "Formula Question 2" with label "Formula Question Label"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify lessons can be navigated by changing the URL

testcase.name: And I create a Mathematical Formula response area in the lesson question editor
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify lessons can be navigated by changing the URL

testcase.name: And I save & close the new question in the assignment editor
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify lessons can be navigated by changing the URL

testcase.name: When I add new page "Page 3" from the section drop down
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify lessons can be navigated by changing the URL

testcase.name: Then a new page "Page 3" appears in the navigation
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify lessons can be navigated by changing the URL

testcase.name: When I click the new question button on the lesson design page
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify lessons can be navigated by changing the URL

testcase.name: And I create question "Formula Question 3" with label "Formula Question Label"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify lessons can be navigated by changing the URL

testcase.name: And I create a Mathematical Formula response area in the lesson question editor
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify lessons can be navigated by changing the URL

testcase.name: And I save & close the new question in the assignment editor
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify lessons can be navigated by changing the URL

testcase.name: When I save & close the lesson on the design page
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify lessons can be navigated by changing the URL

testcase.name: Then I see summary of the lesson with warning text "WARNING: Empty section"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify lessons can be navigated by changing the URL

testcase.name: When I save it anyway
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify lessons can be navigated by changing the URL

testcase.name: Then the new lesson "Lesson url navigation" is visible in its own expanded column
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify lessons can be navigated by changing the URL

testcase.name: When I navigate to the System Homepage
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify lessons can be navigated by changing the URL

testcase.name: And I am on "Class Homepage" page of "Demonstration Class" class
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify lessons can be navigated by changing the URL

testcase.name: And I click on the "Lesson url navigation" module in the "Student Readiness" unit
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify lessons can be navigated by changing the URL

testcase.name: Then the module "Lesson url navigation" is opened without launch page
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify lessons can be navigated by changing the URL

testcase.name: When I change the url to view page "Page 3"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify lessons can be navigated by changing the URL

testcase.name: Then I am on page "Page 3"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify lessons can be navigated by changing the URL

testcase.name: When I change the url to view page "Page"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify lessons can be navigated by changing the URL

testcase.name: Then I am on page "Page"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify lessons can be navigated by changing the URL

testcase.name: When I change the url to view page "Page 2"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify lessons can be navigated by changing the URL

testcase.name: Then I am on page "Page 2"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify lessons can be navigated by changing the URL

testcase.name: classMethod
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify lessons can be navigated by changing the URL
